definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very

sentences.english: Archangel Michael is the Angel of Miracles who strengthens the spirit during difficult times or dangerous situations.
sentences.chinese: 大天使麥可是在艱難或危險時刻強化心智的奇蹟天使。

sentences.english: His children, Alice and Mike were very glad.
sentences.chinese: 他的兩個孩子，愛莉絲與麥可都非常的高興。

sentences.english: I ´m Michael Scott, do you remember me?
sentences.chinese: 我是麥可“斯柯特，還記得我嗎？

sentences.english: The Macdonalds finished supper at Macdonald's, then bowled at the bowling alley.
sentences.chinese: 麥可糖那一家在麥當勞喫過晚飯後去球館打保齡。

sentences.english: Mike's boss slammed the door on his request for a job transfer.
sentences.chinese: 麥可要求調任時，他的老闆賞了他閉門羹。

sentences.english: You might say that Michael is clothed in "approachability."
sentences.chinese: 你可以說，麥可的服裝讓他平易近人。

sentences.english: Michael Jackson's sudden death has sent shockwaves across Asia and the world.
sentences.chinese: 麥可傑克森的突然驟逝，衝擊了全亞洲和整個世界。

sentences.english: This month features a photo of David Alcaide and Michaela Tabb at the World Cup of Pool.
sentences.chinese: 本月特點的照片，朱阿爾凱德和麥可泰伯在世界盃池。

sentences.english: "This is not a science issue, " said Michael Zimmerman, a 9)dean at the University of Wisconsin Oshkosh.
sentences.chinese: 威斯康辛大學歐西高許分校一位主任麥可辛馬曼表示。

sentences.english: Yiguan and Yifan have a heated argument over Michael.
sentences.chinese: 一官和一帆爲了麥可而爭吵。

sentences.english: Due to a sports injury, Michael was bed-ridden for two weeks.
sentences.chinese: 由於運動傷害，麥可在牀上躺了兩星期。

sentences.english: Michael just bought a new tent and sleeping bags for the family camping trip.
sentences.chinese: 麥可剛爲全家的露營之旅，買了新帳棚和睡袋。

sentences.english: Nana rests her case when she finds out that Michael is Jufu's elder son.
sentences.chinese: 娜娜知道麥可是居福的兒子後立刻息事。

sentences.english: Jufu is unhappy when Michael brings Yifan to the office.
sentences.chinese: 居福不滿麥可帶一帆到辦公室。

sentences.english: Center half Mike netted his first goal for the club.
sentences.chinese: 中場時麥可爲俱樂部入網了他的第一分。

sentences.english: Mike had Wolff-Parkinson White Syndrome, which caused tachycardia.
sentences.chinese: 麥可天生有心律不整的問題，造成心搏過速。

definition: Milton (name)/John Milton (1608-1674), English republican writer and poet, author of Paradise Lost
Handel (name)/George Frideric Handel (1685-1759), German-born Baroque composer, naturalized British in 1727
Haydn (name)/Franz Joseph Haydn (1732-1809), Austrian classical composer
Lai Shengchuan (1954-), US-Taiwanese dramatist and director
Jobs (name)/see also 史提夫·賈伯斯|史提夫·贾伯斯[Shi3 ti2 fu1 · Jia3 bo2 si1], Steve Jobs
the Franks (Germanic people who arrived in Europe from 600 AD and took over France)
